Good Comments: Faster than underwater and once they got rolling do a good job for the community which needed a fansub for this show.

A poor release group for this anime.

1. Bad subs which requires v2s weekly which are still full of errors.
2. Timing + Typesetting issues
3. Using crappy raws
Bad Comments:
Awful subs. Requires corrections weekly. Too many errors on translation.

Stay away!

Good Comments: Objectively, this is unwatchable. Typos, grammar errors & mistranslations everywhere. However, sometimes you have to bite the bullet when it's the only sub available. If a proper sub group, even Commie, were to sub this movie, it'd be a better experience.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Aru Hi Inu no Kuni kara Tegami ga Kite
Hai to Gensou no Grimgar: Furo no Kabe ni Kaketa Seishun - One More Centimeter

Good Comments: Fast.....and just great sub....waited for this, and only this sub group subbed this
Haters here are dumb. Ganbarou subs were the same as the official subs, only OCR'd. No missing lines, no shitty editing. Perfectly watchable.
Typesetting was terrible, "O" replaced by "0", unsubbed lines while singing was subbed... Bad, just bad.
Bad Comments: Typos were worse than person learning English as 18th language for first week.  Song lyrics would cut off subtitles and make it impossible to read for minutes.
Subs display normally, if they cut off it's your fault. And the subs are the official ones, deal with it.
Spelling errors. Typesetting errors. Missing dialogue during important parts.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Okusama ga Seitokaichou!: Seitokaichou to Ofuro Asobi

Good Comments: Quite a few lines are mistranslated or leave out too many details of the conversation and thus do not flow well together.

Subbed Projects.Show Name: Persona 3 the Movie 4: Winter of Rebirth

Good Comments: I suppose this is a decent effort, lacking the guide/cheatsheet of a CR script; it is accurate in broad strokes. However, there are times when the meaning is totally warped or inverted. Furthermore, some phrasings are simply strange/misleading.
Bad Comments: Only subs available, but overally pretty accurate and with fitting terminology.
